name: Ass Downloader
description:
A game where you play as @dril and venture forth to defeat the infamous Ass Downloader. But be careful, otherwise it could be YOU downloading the asses!

A variety of @dril tweets served as the inspiration for this game.


  • The initial design doc can be seen here.
  • Incremental project updates can be seen here.
